title: The Iron Giant
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*Not to be confused with normal [iron giants](/Iron_giant "Iron giant").*

| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                 | [rF+](/Fire "Fire"), [rC+](/Cold "Cold"), [rPois+](/Poison "Poison"), [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation"), [rWater](/Category:Water_resistance "Category:Water resistance") |

| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Huge, lumbering, and particularly dull, this rusting monolith packs quite the punch. It is quite possibly the largest giant you have ever seen. |

*For a list of all giants, see [list of giants](/List_of_giants "List of giants").*

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

The **Iron Giant** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [stone giant](/Stone_giant "Stone giant") found only in [Dungeon Sprint](/Dungeon_Sprint "Dungeon Sprint"). Instead of throwing [large rocks](/Large_rock "Large rock"), he will shoot you with powerful [Iron Shots](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") and will summon [iron elementals](/Iron_elemental "Iron elemental") to support him. On top of that, he has [resistances](/Resistance "Resistance") to most elements, immunity to [Silence](/Silence "Silence"), and hits like a truck in melee. Have fun!

## Spells

| Spell set |                                                                            |                                                      |
| :-------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") (3d37)                                 | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2     | [Summon Iron Elementals](/Summon_Iron_Elementals "Summon Iron Elementals") | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- He's got an [EV](/EV "EV") score of 2. If you're packing a [rod](/Rod "Rod") capable of casting [Bolt of Inaccuracy](/Bolt_of_Inaccuracy "Bolt of Inaccuracy"), this is its time to shine.

## History

- The Iron Giant was converted into a regular monster, [Iron giant](/Iron_giant "Iron giant"), in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").

The Iron Giant

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

Not to be confused with normal iron giants.

the iron giant C 
HP 220
HD 22
XP 5362
Speed 10
AC 18
EV 2
Will 120
Attack1 60 (hit: plain)


Resistances rF+, rC+,
rPois+, rDrown,
rWater
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Normal
Uses Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Giant
Type giant, the iron giant
Flags Fighter
Speaks
Unique
Warm-blooded
Huge, lumbering, and particularly dull, this rusting monolith packs quite the punch. It is quite possibly the largest giant you have ever seen.

For a list of all giants, see list of giants.


Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

The Iron Giant is a unique stone giant found only in Dungeon Sprint. Instead of throwing large rocks, he will shoot you with powerful Iron Shots and will summon iron elementals to support him. On top of that, he has resistances to most elements, immunity to Silence, and hits like a truck in melee. Have fun!

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 Iron Shot (3d37) Magical flag
Slot2 Summon Iron Elementals Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • He's got an EV score of 2. If you're packing a rod capable of casting Bolt of Inaccuracy, this is its time to shine.

History

  • The Iron Giant was converted into a regular monster, Iron giant, in 0.18.
